title: Continue using or gathering dust? A mixed method research on the factors influencing the continuous use intention for an AI-powered adaptive learning system for rural middle school students
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Jining Han, Geping Liu, Xinmiao Liu, Yuying Yang, Wenying Quan, Yongfu Chen
